original: Cederschiöld, Gustaf Vilhelm, fil. dr, lektor, Göteborg, f. 22/5/82 i Lund av prof. Gust. C. o. Lova Widegren. G. 08 m. Hildur Kjellberg. Barn: Lars Gust. Oilof f. 09, Gudrun 17. — Stud:-ex. i Gbg 00, fil. kand. i Gbg 03, fil. lic. i Upps. 09, fil. dr 13, provår 10-11. Res. t. Leipzigs univ. vint. 03-04, m. Upps. stud:kårs nord. stip. t. Köpenhamn 09-10, Norge 10, Tyskl. 21, Frankr. 25, 27 o. 28. Lär. v. Bill-strömska folkhögsk., Tjörn, 05-06, ord. lär. v. Gbgs samsk. 11-12 o. 13, tim-lär. där 10-11, 12, 13-15 o. 25-34, v. Kjellbergska h. lär:nesem. 13-31, v. Gbgs kvinnl. folksk :sem. 18-27, e. lär. v. Gbgs latin sed. 13, lektor v. Gbgs real sed. 15. Led. av fören. 1882 års män. Skr.: God o. dålig svenska (27), Konsten att skriva svenska (30), Sant o. osant i folksägnerna (32), Barn- språk (44), S’pråkvet :is:kapl. und isökn,, hist., litt :hist. o. folklorist. upps. RNO, LVVS.
translated: Cederschiöld, Gustaf Vilhelm, PhD, teacher, Gothenburg, b. May 22, 1882 in Lund to Professor Gustav C. and Lova Widegren. Married in 1908 to Hildur Kjellberg. Children: Lars Gust. Oilof b. 1909 and Gudrun b. 1917. Studied in Gothenburg, graduating in 1900. Received Bachelor's degree in Gothenburg in 1903, Licentiate degree in Uppsala in 1909, PhD in 1913, and completed a probationary year in 1910-1911. Traveled to Leipzig University in the winter of 1903-1904, as well as receiving funding from Uppsala student association for trips to Copenhagen in 1909-1910, Norway in 1910, Germany in 1921, France in 1925, 1927, and 1928. Teacher at Bill-strömska folkhögskola in Tjörn in 1905-1906, regular teacher at Gothenburg samskola in 1911-1912 and 1913, substitute teacher there in 1910-1911, 1912, 1913-1915, and 1925-1934. Teacher at Kjellbergska högre lär:nesem. in 1913-1931, at Gothenburg kvinnliga folksk :sem. in 1918-1927, and at Gothenburg latin sed. in 1913. Became a lektor at Gothenburg real sed. in 1915. Member of the Society of 1882. Wrote books on the Swedish language and folklore titled "God o. dålig svenska" (27), "Konsten att skriva svenska" (30), "Sant o. osant i folksägnerna" (32), "Barnspråk" (44), "S’pråkvet :is:kapl. und isökn,, hist., litt :hist. o. folklorist. upps.". Awarded the RNO and LVVS.
